options.description: Show this help message and exit
Show a help message with all program options
FASTQ file of first short reads in each pair (required)
FASTQ file of second short reads in each pair (required)
FASTQ file of unpaired short reads (optional)
FASTQ or FASTA file of long reads (optional)
Level of stdout and log file information (default: 1)   0 = no stdout, 1 = basic progress indicators,   2 = extra info, 3 = debugging info
Exclude contigs from the FASTA file which are shorter than this length (default: 100)

Level of file retention (default: 1)   0 = only keep final files: assembly (FASTA,   GFA and log),   1 = also save graphs at main checkpoints,   2 = also keep SAM (enables fast rerun in different mode),   3 = keep all temp files and save all graphs (for debugging)
Produce a VCF by mapping the short reads to the final assembly (experimental, default: do not produce a vcf file)

Bridging mode (default: normal)   conservative = smaller contigs, lowest misassembly                  rate   normal = moderate contig size and misassembly rate   bold = longest contigs, higher misassembly rate
The expected number of linear (i.e. non-circular) sequences in the underlying sequence (default: 0)
